Get_it_now_before_it: Get it now before it runs out!
Now_and_for_a_limited_time: Now and for a limited time, take advantage of a
Tax_included_this_offer_is_limited: Tax included, this offer is limited
To_order_please_fill_in_the_boxes_below: To order, please fill in the boxes below

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a 7-day return policy from the date of delivery. Items must be unused and in original packaging.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: Currently, we ship only within the listed countries on our website. More regions will be added soon!

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer: Once your order is shipped, you will receive an email with the tracking link.

faqs.question: Can I cancel or change my order?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel or modify your order within 1 hour of placing it. Contact support for help.

We_offer_you_the_opportunity: We offer you the opportunity to return items free of charge, within 30 days of the delivery date.
Enjoy_free_express_delivery: Enjoy free express delivery for all our products to wherever you are in the Gulf countries.
This_product_after_its_global: This product, after its global success, is now available for the first time in the Gulf countries.
Cash_on_delivery_is_supported: Cash on delivery is supported for this product. Place your order and pay when the product arrives to you.
To_avoid_any_problems_in_processing: To avoid any problems in processing customer requests, we follow these clear steps.
We_ship_the_order_to_you: We ship the order to you
After_confirming_the_order: After confirming the order, it will be shipped within 1-3 business days.
Order_the_quantity_you_want: Order the quantity you want, you will need to provide your address and contact information.
Order_now_and_pay_upon_receipt: Order now and pay upon receipt
Your_order_has_been_successfully: Your order has been successfully registered, thank you for choosing our store.
We_are_happy_that_you_chose_our: We are happy that you chose our store and we hope that your experience with our products is very special. We will contact you to confirm and ship your order.
Please_answer_the_phone_to_enjoy_a_quick: Please answer the phone to enjoy a quick shopping experience  ⚠️
